product_details.name: Samsung 7 kg, Eco Bubble Technology, Digital Inverter Motor, Soft Closing Door, Fully-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine (WA70BG4441YYTL, Lavender Gray)
product_details.description: Item Weight: 29 kg 500 g. Specification Met: Energy Star. Controller Type: Fully Automatic. Option Cycles: 9. Number of Washing Cycles: 9. Finish Type: Glass,Stainless Steel. Washer Dispenser Options: Detergent. Laundry Appliance Drum Material: Stainless Steel. Model: WA70BG4441YYTL. Energy Efficiency: 5 Star Rating. Noise Level: 48 dB. Installation Type: Free Standing. Part Number: WA70BG4441YYTL. Form Factor: Top-Loading. Special Features: Inverter, Water Level 5.00. Number of Standard Cycles: 9. Connector Type: Water inlet & Drain. Number of Vents: 2. Material: Stainless-Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Samsung India Electronics Pvt. Ltd. having its Registered Office at: 6th Floor, DLF Centre, Sansad Marg, New Delhi-110001. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 56.6 x 54 x 98.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Piece. Generic Name: Fully-Automatic Top Load Washing Machines.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek product advertisement for an automatic washing machine. The background features layered curved shapes in gradients of blue with two decorative semi-transparent circular elements, creating a clean and modern feel. Centered at the top is a bold brand title (id: "heading") followed by a subheading (id: "subheading") that introduces the product feature. The washing machine image (id: "product_image") is centrally positioned, acting as the focal point. Below it, a feature tagline (id: "tagline") reinforces the product’s technology, followed by a large, bold price display (id: "price"). A prominent call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") with contrasting white text (id: "cta") urges immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue (#E6F4F9)
- Pale Blue (#D1E5F0)
- Steel Blue (#A5C6E0)
- Desaturated Blue (#87A7C4)
- Deep Navy (#2C3E50)
- Dark Slate (#34495E)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image utilizes a sleek and modern color palette featuring metallic silver (#d1d3d4), black (#000000), and white (#ffffff), creating a clean and premium aesthetic. A vibrant red (#d32f2f) is used for the energy star label, subtly drawing attention without overpowering the design. The blue arrow (#0074e4) adds a touch of color diversity, highlighting the product's functionality. The silver body of the washing machine reflects a premium build while blending seamlessly with dark black control elements for contrast. The bold black typography stands out sharply against the light silver background, ensuring excellent readability and emphasis on key features.
